stadium.name: The South Pole Palisade
stadium.description: A crude, fortified playing field built from rough-hewn logs. It's less a stadium and more a stockade against the wilderness. The 'grass' is mostly frozen mud and straw.

stats.pregame_ritual: Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Turning their helmet around three times before putting it on.
Licking a whetstone.

stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE FROZEN FRONTIER! üéôÔ∏è

Good evening, sports fans, and welcome to another bone-chilling, blood-spilling edition of **Tuesday Night Trollball**! I‚Äôm your host, the demon with the screaming demon inside the microphone, **Nok the Corrupter**! We are live from the absolute edge of civilization, The South Pole Palisade! It is cold, it is miserable, and it is the perfect night for violence! The wind is howling, the wolves are hungry, and the ground is hard enough to break a spine on impact! Just the way we like it!

Tonight, we have a clash that defies the laws of comfort! Visiting us from the dripping, humid swamps of the west, we have **The Zmeigorod Snessengers**! That‚Äôs right, folks, High Priestess Oona‚Äôs little mud-skippers have dragged themselves all the way down here. I‚Äôve been watching their warm-ups, and I have to say, they are‚Ä¶ eccentric! Did you see **Delija Dowling**? He just chugged a raw egg, shell and all! Disgusting! I love it! And **Arni Griffith** is over there whispering to the ball, giving it a heroic backstory? Listen, pal, the only story that ball has is that it‚Äôs about to be covered in your teeth!

Defending their frozen turf are the locals, the hard-bitten survivalists, **The South Pole Yetis**! These folks are tough. They have to be! They live in a town that‚Äôs basically a pile of logs fighting off the apocalypse! Their healer, **Seiter Aida**, was seen huffing their own game-worn socks to get into the zone. That is the kind of depraved dedication that wins championships, folks! They are representing Cedar Hill, so you know Imra probably mixed them up some antifreeze cocktails to keep the blood pumping!

Will the swamp dwellers slip on the ice? Will the Yetis freeze under pressure? There‚Äôs only one way to find out! The weapons are drawn, the healers are trembling, and the crowd is screaming for blood! **LET‚ÄôS PLAY TROLLBALL!**
postGame:
# üßä THE ICE BOWL BLOODBATH! üßä

Holy frozen toes, sports fans! What a match! What a massacre! If you missed this one, you missed a masterclass in defensive brutality! We saw limbs flying, weapons swinging, and bodies hitting the permafrost with a sound like cracking thunder! It wasn't a high-scoring affair, but who needs points when you have PAIN? That's what I always say!

The action started fast and frantic in the freezing rain. Both teams came out of the gate looking to make a statement, but the defenses were tighter than a miser's purse strings! We saw missed tackle after missed tackle as the players slid around on the icy field. It looked like a dance recital gone wrong out there for a minute!

The Zmeigorod Snessengers thought they had an opening when the Yetis' **Jessy Debbie** tried to throw a long bomb. But **Rose Kluge**‚Äîoh, sweet Rose!‚Äîread it like a cheap dime novel and snatched that ball out of the air! INTERCEPTION! The swamp-folk were in business! Or so they thought.

The Snessengers' offense, however, seemed to be suffering from a severe case of frostbite. **Kleinstein MacGregor** lined up for a shot from Home Field‚Äîa gimme for a pro!‚Äîand shanked it wide! Completely missed the goal! I tell you, folks, you could see the disappointment on Valos's face all the way from the bog!

Then, the Yetis decided that if they couldn't score points, they would score fractures! The violence cranked up to eleven! **Selima Si**, wearing those garish undergarments for luck, lowered the boom on **Alded Sanjay**. CRUNCH! Sanjay went down like a sack of potatoes and didn't get up! That is an INJURY, folks! That is the sound of victory!

But the Yetis weren't done! Not by a long shot! Moments later, **Hilaire Guevara** caught **Avaria Revell** with a tackle that would have stopped a charging rhino. BAM! Another Snessenger bites the ice! Two players down! The Grove's roster is getting thinner by the minute! I haven't seen that much carnage since the last time I visited the Demon Prison cafeteria!

Despite the Yetis turning the Snessengers into a field hospital, nobody could find the net! **Duky Orelee** missed a shot! **Sayers Erdda** missed a shot! It was a comedy of errors, if comedy involved heavy weaponry and concussions. The regulation whistle blew with a score of absolute ZERO to absolute ZERO.

We went to **OVERTIME**! Sudden death! The tension was palpable! The crowd at the Palisade was going wild, or maybe they were just trying to keep warm! The ball was live, and **Isborne Krause** scooped it up. It was anyone's game!

But then, like a bolt of lightning in a blizzard, **Sale Tocci** took control! She grabbed that leather troll head, weaved through the exhausted, battered, and bruised Snessengers defense, and charged into the End Zone! With a scream that echoed across the tundra, she **DUNKED THE BALL INTO THE GOAL!**

GAME OVER! The South Pole Yetis take it home! A hard-fought, bloody, freezing victory for the locals! The Snessengers are going to have a long, painful limp back to Zmeigorod to explain this one to Oona. Maybe next time, bring fewer raw eggs and more bandages!

**FINAL SCORE:**
**The South Pole Yetis: 1**
**The Zmeigorod Snessengers: 0**

This is Nok the Corrupter, reminding you to ice your bruises and sharpen your axes! Goodnight, Osterra!
